ch.linetic.gui.component

Class UserListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • controlP5.ControllerGroup<T>
      • controlP5.ControlGroup<controlP5.ListBox>
        • controlP5.ListBox
          • ch.linetic.gui.component.UserListBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    controlP5.ControllerInterface<controlP5.ListBox>, controlP5.ControlListener, controlP5.ControlP5Constants, java.util.Observer

    public class UserListBox
extends controlP5.ListBox
implements java.util.Observer
    Extension of the class ListBox from the library "controlP5" used for displaying a real time list of all user recognized by the kinect at any moment
    Author:
    ketsio

           int width,
           int height)
        Creates a UserListBox given its size, position and the map of users of the application
        Parameters:
        cp5 - the ControlP5 instance of the application
        users - the map of users of the application
        x - the x coordinate of the position
        y - the y coordinate of the position
        width - the width of the component
        height - the height of the component
